column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Main Aang Appa Katara Momo Roku Sokka Antagonists Fire Sages Iroh Zhao Zuko says : " Minor Senlin Village leader Shyu " Sokka says : " You guys are going to be done soon , right ?
#Text=Like you 're ready to go right now , naked guy ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I could be ready in two minutes .
#Text=Seriously , whenever .
#Text=" Aang says : " So you were showing me the octopus form ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Right , let me see your stance .
#Text=" Katara says : " Your arms are too far apart .
#Text=See , if you move them closer together , you protect your center .
#Text=You got it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh , yea ... thanks .
#Text=" Katara says : " Okay , let 's see what you got .
#Text=" Katara says : " You make a fine octopus , Pupil Aang .
#Text=" Chong says : " Da , da , da .
#Text=Do n't fall in love with the traveling girl .
#Text=She 'll leave you broke and brokenhearted .
#Text=Hey , river people !
#Text=" Katara says : " We 're not river people .
#Text=" Chong says : " You 're not ?
#Text=Well then what kind of people are you ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Just ... people .
#Text=" Chong says : " Are n't we all , brother ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Who are you ?
#Text=" Chong says : " I 'm Chong and this is my wife , Lily .
#Text=We 're nomads , happy to go wherever the wind takes us !
#Text=" Aang says : " You guys are nomads ?
#Text=That 's great !
#Text=I 'm a nomad !
#Text=" Chong says : " Hey , me too !
#Text=" Aang says : " I know ... you just said that .
#Text=" Chong says : " Oh .
#Text=Nice underwear ... "
